input.sentences: apparently a bunch of people decided to dress up and parade down the streets today ! here 's a tractor leading the charge .
it was hauling this beautiful garden with an adorable family .
there was a dalek creeping along too . exterminate !
some kids decided to roll along with some rainbows trailing .
my favorite of the day was this medieval group . looked pretty realistic | really .
output.sentences: The tractor pulls people down the streets in the parade.
One parade float is hauling a family sitting in a garden.
Another parade float is a creeping robot set to exterminate aliens.
Tailing the floats are the rolling rainbows.
The medieval costumes are pretty realistic.
